#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, k, n1;

	scanf("%d", &t );
	cin.ignore();

	while( t-- ) {

		string s1, s2, s3;

		getline( cin, s1 );
		getline( cin, s2 );

		n1 = s1.length();

		s3 = s1 + s1;
		k = s3.find( s2 );

		if( ( k >= 0 ) && ( k < n1 ) )
			cout << "YES" << endl;
		else
			cout << "NO" << endl;

	}

	return 0;
}
